mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO OURRANKING (ranking, gamename, madecompany, genre, score, createAt) VALUES
( #{item.ranking}, #{item.gamename}, #{item.madecompany}, #{item.genre}, #{item.score}, #{item.createAt} )
mapper.select: select * from OURRANKING order by ranking
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY score DESC) as ranking, gamename, madecompany, genre, score FROM OURRANKING WHERE genre like 'MMORPG' ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY score DESC) as ranking, gamename, madecompany, genre, score FROM OURRANKING WHERE genre like '액션%' ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY score DESC) as ranking, gamename, madecompany, genre, score FROM OURRANKING WHERE genre like 'FPS' ORDER BY score DESC

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY score DESC) as ranking, gamename, madecompany, genre, score FROM OURRANKING WHERE genre NOT LIKE 'MMORPG%' AND genre NOT LIKE '액션%' AND genre NOT LIKE 'FPS' ORDER BY score DESC;
